entries.title: Core Materials & Production
entries.summary: All ships use the five core minerals.
entries.content: All ships require the five core minerals in varying amounts: Ferrite Alloy (hulls), Crytite (energy storage), Ardanium (FTL reinforcement), Vornite (electronics), Zerothium (warp stability). Specialized minerals are role-specific. Regional spawn bias makes trade and control essential.

entries.title: Shipyard & Roles
entries.summary: Build by class; filter by role.
entries.content: Use the Shipyard to build Frigates, Battleships, and Capitals. Filter by roles like stealth, brawler, sniper, ECM, carrier, miner, and logistics to find the right fit. Each blueprint lists specialized minerals.

entries.title: Welcome, Commander
entries.summary: A quick primer for new players.
entries.content:
**Welcome to Starfront: Dominion!**

This short guide covers the basics:
- Select your ship and set a destination with the map.
- Warp to points of interest like belts and nebulae.
- Mine resources (rock, gas, energy) and haul them back.
- Use stations to store, build, and expand.

Open other tabs on the left to learn about ships, stations, resources, and core rules. Good luck, Commander!

entries.title: Explorer Ship
entries.content:
The Explorer is a versatile scouting vessel.

**Highlights**
- Scan Range: 50
- Speed: 4
- Cargo: 10

Use it to find belts, nebulae, and opportunities.

entries.title: Mining Vessel
entries.content:
Mining Vessels gather resources efficiently from nodes.

**Tips**
- Position in dense hotspots for best yield.
- Watch cargo capacity and return to station to unload.

entries.title: Logistics Ship
entries.content:
Logistics ships move cargo between outposts and bases.

They shine in team play and persistent economies.

entries.title: Wraith Scout (Frigate)
entries.content: Invisible reconnaissance frigate. Ideal for deep recon, warp scouting, and uncovering cloaked ships. Longest scan range in its class; fragile in combat.

entries.title: Maul-Class Brawler Frigate (Frigate)
entries.content: Close-range enforcer. Thick armor and short-range cannons excel at holding chokepoints and smashing light screens; slower and vulnerable to kiting.

entries.title: Lance Precision Sniper (Frigate)
entries.content: Long-range assassin with a spinal mass driver. Picks off high-value targets from beyond typical ranges; extremely fragile up close.

entries.title: Viper Interceptor (Frigate)
entries.content: Fast pursuit craft to run down couriers and scouts. Deadly alone; folds under focus. Carries EMP torpedoes to disable engines.

entries.title: Needle Gunship (Frigate)
entries.content:
Precision alpha-strike platform to delete small ships. Best for surgical strikes; poor in prolonged engagements.

Abilities & Systems:
- Auralite Lance: Long-range burst (size: frigate), massive single-target damage, overpenetrates for 50% if it kills the first target; cooldown and energy cost.
- Quarzon Micro-Missiles: Moderate tracking damage with sensor-scrambling shrapnel (−20% accuracy for 2 turns); low energy cost.
- Phantom Burn: Active evasion/stealth shimmer; +80% evasion vs. turret fire, +50% missile dodge for short duration; energy cost.
- Strike Vector Insertion: Short micro-warp reposition before/after strike; energy cost.

Playstyle: Line up the lance, reposition with Strike Vector, then Phantom Burn to escape. Sustained DPS is weak—time your volleys.

entries.title: Drill Skiff (Frigate)
entries.content: Entry miner with superb maneuverability in belts. Generates early resource advantage; must avoid all combat.

entries.title: Shade ECM Frigate (Frigate)
entries.content: Electronic ghost that blinds targeting and disrupts comms. Flips fights without firing; dies quickly if focused.

entries.title: Sting Torpedo Boat (Frigate)
entries.content: Hit-and-run siege craft. Torpedoes cripple larger ships; long reloads and fragile hull demand timing.

entries.title: Swift Courier (Frigate)
entries.content: Critical logistics runner. Keeps forward fleets supplied. Unarmed—must avoid contact.

entries.title: Raven Gunship-Scout (Frigate)
entries.content: Hybrid scout-striker. Finds and eliminates light ships; less stealthy/lethal than specialists but versatile.

entries.title: Jackal Interceptor-Boarder (Frigate)
entries.content: Chases and latches for boarding. Terrifying to freighters; struggles vs. escorts.

entries.title: Mako Miner-Raider (Frigate)
entries.content: Pirate miner that steals mid-operation. Income and disruption; weaker yield than dedicated miners; ambush-capable.

entries.title: Ghost ECM-Torpedo (Frigate)
entries.content: Ambush predator; cloaks into range and unloads devastating torpedoes. Deadly first strike; vulnerable after.

entries.title: Kite Patrol Frigate (Frigate)
entries.content: Escort and convoy guard; decent defense with some cargo. Protection-focused; weak offense.

entries.title: Warhammer Gunline-Siege (Battleship)
entries.content: Long-range planetary/station breaker. Dominates static defenses; weak to swarms/flanks.

entries.title: Bulwark Fortress (Battleship)
entries.content: Holds chokepoints indefinitely. Excellent deterrent; slow to redeploy.

entries.title: Tempest Gunline (Battleship)
entries.content: Broadside brawler for long, grinding engagements. Devastating in formation; positioning sensitive.

entries.title: Cerberus Carrier-Battleship (Battleship)
entries.content: Fighter-launching with strong shields. Projects force; struggles against heavy armor.

entries.title: Leviathan Beam Destroyer (Battleship)
entries.content: Surgical capital killer. One charged shot swings battles; vulnerable during charge.

entries.title: Tidebreaker Torpedo Dreadnought (Battleship)
entries.content: Salvo platform that annihilates capitals at range. Needs screens.

entries.title: Sentinel ECM Fortress (Battleship)
entries.content: Battlefield disruptor; strips targeting and coordination. No direct threat alone.

entries.title: Harbormaster Logistics Command (Battleship)
entries.content: Keeps fleets supplied; decisive in long wars. Must be defended.

entries.title: Atlas Fleet Tender (Battleship)
entries.content: Mobile repair dock; game-changing sustain; defenseless alone.

entries.title: Aegis Defensive Carrier (Battleship)
entries.content: Hybrid defense + fighter support. Great in attrition; lacks punch.

entries.title: Star Marshal (Battleship)
entries.content: Combines artillery with fleet command buffs; boosts capability with ranged offense.

entries.title: Specter Siege (Battleship)
entries.content: Long-range destruction + ECM disruption; denies approach and prevents close engagement.

entries.title: Iron Anchor (Battleship)
entries.content: Immovable logistics stronghold; locks down sectors; high-value target.

entries.title: Eclipse Supercarrier (Capital)
entries.content: Deploys massive fighter/bomber swarms; dominates control; must be screened.

entries.title: Leviathan Dreadnought (Capital)
entries.content: Floating fortress with unmatched broadside; controls sectors; very slow.

entries.title: Aurora Flagship (Capital)
entries.content: Fleet-wide command boosts with pinpoint strikes; strategic centerpiece.

entries.title: Nemesis Siege Platform (Capital)
entries.content: Fortification annihilator; ends sieges quickly; needs protection.

entries.title: Phalanx Heavy Shield Ship (Capital)
entries.content: Creates fleet-sized shield domes; critical in defense; energy-intensive.

entries.title: Eclipse Marauder (Capital)
entries.content: Stealth battleship with devastating ambush potential and ECM; high risk if revealed.

entries.title: Colossus Mobile Shipyard (Capital)
entries.content: Constructs capitals in deep space; centerpiece of long campaigns; high-value piracy target.

entries.title: Oasis Worldship (Capital)
entries.content: Mobile trade hub and political center; generates wealth while traveling.

entries.title: Atlas Prime Megafreighter (Capital)
entries.content: Moves immense resources between systems; vital to economic dominance.

entries.title: Artemis Exploration Carrier (Capital)
entries.content: Charts deep space and anomalies; opens high-risk, high-reward routes and events.

entries.title: Bastion Fleet Anchor (Capital)
entries.content: Permanent forward base that locks down sectors.

entries.title: Behemoth Planet-Cracker (Capital)
entries.content: Tears apart moons/planets for resources; massive political and environmental fallout.

entries.title: Aether Gas Refinery (Capital)
entries.content: Refines volatile gases for high-tech fuel; essential for energy-weapon fleets.

entries.title: Auric Prospecting Ark (Capital)
entries.content: Locates the rarest minerals in the galaxy; major strategic investment.

entries.title: Turns & Locking
entries.content: Plan your moves, then lock your turn. The server resolves movement, mining, and scanning in phases.

entries.title: Scanning & Visibility
entries.content: Scan range reveals objects; active scan extends range at an energy cost.

entries.title: Mining
entries.content: Mine from resource nodes until depleted. Dense hotspots boost player interaction and efficiency.

entries.title: Movement & Warp
entries.content: Move tile-by-tile or warp to fields and gates. Interstellar travel requires proximity to a gate.

entries.title: Asteroid Belts
entries.content: Belts contain clusters of rock near warp entry. Expect competition and rich deposits.

entries.title: Nebulae
entries.content: Nebula clusters and filaments appear near warp entry; great for gas harvesting.

entries.title: Stars
entries.content: Energy nodes spawn in safe orbital zones around stars.

entries.title: Derelicts
entries.content: Old structures with salvage and exploration hooks.
